game.name: Inferno Monster ball hell run
game.description:
Everyone among of us wants to be in the heaven. However, only a few get a chance to book their place there. The aggression, greediness and hungriness for money have made all of us a bad soul. Today any of your bad deed has brought to you in a big trouble. As a response, you have lost your soul. The only way to get it is to reach the checkpoint safely by going through the nine circles of Hell. Your path is full of the darkness, the howls, the demons and the chainsaws. They will do their best to stop you from reaching the Heaven. 

Do you think that you are capable enough to cheat all of the bad souls and get your lost soul again? Join Inferno: Monster Ball Hell Run game and be prepared to rise up and save your soul! The good news is that you are not alone at all as the best game-play combined with the fantastic background music and magical design will be there to support you in this brand new adventure game. Enter a very dangerous, dark and a mysterious story and solve it by putting your logical skills to test!

This book has been in the darkness for thousands of years and it has a lot of dark magic inside. This boy curiously opened this book and the strange tornado sucked his soul directly into the book. Now, his soul has reached into a hellish and place. Cross all nine hell gates to save his soul and help him get it back soon in this cute html5 running game! Many more scary and funny incidents will come when you try to save him. Be careful as the obstacles might come from any of the sides! Good luck to complete all missions and have fun without download games!
